fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • Due to an error in the information supplied, a picture accompanying Friday’s coronavirus coverage was described as showing “St Thomas’ hospital’s virus pod”. The pictured pod was elsewhere in London, at University College hospital (page 8). • A Pass notes column incorrectly stated that all staff at the financial services company Gravity Payments were paid $70,000. This is the minimum salary paid to employees (4 March, page 2, G2). • Other recently amended articles include: Coronavirus: nine reasons to be reassured I’m an ICU doctor. The NHS isn’t ready for the coronavirus crisis Javier Pérez de Cuéllar obituary Bard labour: boost workplace productivity ‘by reading a poem’ ‘It’s scary’: Bridgend braces for fallout from Ford factory closure
